metadata.title: CVE-2015-1370 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in marked 0.3.2 and earlier for Node.jsallows remote attackers to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks via avbscript tag in a link.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1370` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-marked - 0.3.9+dfsg-1
node-marked - 0.3.9+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-marked package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.9+dfsg-1').
